TopicTitle: Landed ships clip through the ground

Articles.Content:
All of my landed ships on the Mun (haven't gone anywhere else yet) end up clipping throught the ground.

If I switch to a different ship or the VAB to launch something else, if I go back to previously landed Mun ships through the Tracking Station and hit "Control", the ship clips through the ground and falls into the planet, very frustrating because it makes rescue missions useless, what with the ship not existing anymore
